name: 演示文稿风格标题模板
description: 基于演示文稿风格的标题样式，H2采用右上角大号数字+装饰线条设计，H3采用左侧条形图+编号设计
author: md-ai

h1.name: 一级标题 - 居中大号数字+装饰
h1.description: 演示文稿风格，居中显示超大号数字，上下有装饰线条，下方显示蓝色标题文字
h1.template:
{{index}}

{{text}}

h2.name: 二级标题 - 右上角大号数字+装饰线条
h2.description: 演示文稿风格，右上角显示大号数字，两侧有橙色装饰线条和点，下方显示蓝色标题文字
h2.template:
{{index}}

{{text}}

h3.name: 三级标题 - 左侧条形图+编号
h3.description: 演示文稿风格，左侧有垂直的蓝橙色条形图，右侧显示编号和蓝色标题文字
h3.template:
<section style="display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 20px 0; gap: 12px;" data-heading="true" data-heading-depth="3">
  <section style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; width: 6px; height: 40px; flex-shrink: 0;">
    <section style="flex: 1; background: {{blue1}}; border-radius: 3px 3px 0 0;"></section>
    <section style="flex: 1; background: {{beige}}; border-radius: 0 0 3px 3px;"></section>
  </section>
  <section style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; flex: 1;">
    <section style="font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; color: {{gray1}}; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif;">{{index}}</section>
    <section style="font-size: 18px; font-weight: 500; color: {{blue1}}; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif;">{{text}}</section>
  </section>
</section>

h4.name: 四级标题 - 简化条形图+编号
h4.description: 基于H3风格的简化版本，左侧条形图更细，编号和文字更小，延续演示文稿风格
h4.template:
<section style="display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 18px 0; gap: 10px;" data-heading="true" data-heading-depth="4">
  <section style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; width: 5px; height: 36px; flex-shrink: 0;">
    <section style="flex: 1; background: {{blue2}}; border-radius: 2.5px 2.5px 0 0;"></section>
    <section style="flex: 1; background: {{orangeLight}}; border-radius: 0 0 2.5px 2.5px;"></section>
  </section>
  <section style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; flex: 1;">
    <section style="font-size: 15px; font-weight: 600; color: {{gray2}}; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif;">{{index}}</section>
    <section style="font-size: 17px; font-weight: 500; color: {{blue2}}; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif;">{{text}}</section>
  </section>
</section>

h5.name: 五级标题 - 左侧细线+编号
h5.description: 延续演示文稿风格，左侧有细线装饰，显示编号和文字
h5.template:
<section style="display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 16px 0; gap: 10px;" data-heading="true" data-heading-depth="5">
  <section style="width: 3px; height: 28px; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, {{blue3}}, {{orangeLight}}); border-radius: 2px; flex-shrink: 0;"></section>
  <section style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; flex: 1;">
    <section style="font-size: 14px; font-weight: 600; color: {{gray3}}; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif;">{{index}}</section>
    <section style="font-size: 16px; font-weight: 500; color: {{blue3}}; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif;">{{text}}</section>
  </section>
</section>

h6.name: 六级标题 - 左侧点+编号
h6.description: 最简洁的演示文稿风格，左侧有装饰点，显示编号和文字
h6.template:
<section style="display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 14px 0; gap: 10px;" data-heading="true" data-heading-depth="6">
  <section style="width: 6px; height: 6px; background: {{blue3}}; border-radius: 50%; flex-shrink: 0;"></section>
  <section style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; flex: 1;">
    <section style="font-size: 13px; font-weight: 600; color: {{gray3}}; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif;">{{index}}</section>
    <section style="font-size: 15px; font-weight: 500; color: {{blue3}}; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif;">{{text}}</section>
  </section>
</section>

usage.description: 这是一个演示文稿风格的标题样式模板，H1采用居中超大号数字设计，H2采用右上角大号数字设计，H3-H6采用左侧装饰+编号设计
usage.applyMethod: 在渲染器中替换heading函数，使用对应的模板生成HTML，需要自动生成标题序号
